definition: intended or appropriate for defending against or deterring aggression or attack, an attitude of defensiveness
details:
adjective
- intended or appropriate for defending against or deterring aggression or attack
= example: intended or appropriate for defending against or deterring aggression or attack
- attempting to justify or defend in speech or writing
= example: attempting to justify or defend in speech or writing
= synonyms: justificative
noun
- an attitude of defensiveness
= example: an attitude of defensiveness
= synonyms: defensive attitude
